name: Save The Burguers Army
description:
[IMPORTANT] This games requires a gamepad to be played.

Some alien pirates arrived on Earth a few weeks ago, with the sole purpose of stealing every cow on the planet. That's weird, right? Well, the worst part is that without cows, there are no Burgers! 

Humanity needs it's greatest hero in these trying times. Sadly, he wasn't available. That's why Gordon was called. To save global gastrony! Did we tell you that Gordon is vegan? He couldn't care less about the burgers. He just wants to save those magnificent beasts (and that sweet paycheck). 
So, go infiltrate the ship of those no good aliens, and save the cornerstone of global cuisine: the burger!

Pabloderivia/Pablo Hernández Torres - Programming and Level Design (https://pabloderivia.itch.io/)
Kierano - Art Assets (https://kierano.itch.io/)
Miguel Inês - Music and Sound Design (https://miguelmusic.itch.io/, https://soundcloud.com/miguelines)

This game was made as an entry for the Beginners Circle Jam #3, by a team of 3 newbies who had a lot of fun and learned a lot about the craft of creating games.
